title: What is this Stretched Serif?
content:
I’ve gone through all the fonts on my computer and none of them match perfectly with this type. PLAYSE HAYLP

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193739im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/MBank_6272.jpg)

 [‹ Identify bankinter typeface please!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45392 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone know what font these are? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45391 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pr3ciousroy

comments.content:
Can you show us the sample?

- Mike Yanega

“Can you show us the sample?”

What do you mean? I posted the picture of it. that’s all i have.

Yes, but your image is in CMYK. Therefore, it won’t show up in some browsers.

[How to post a sample or image](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193739/http:/typophile.com/node/18067)  
Make sure it’s RGB next time.

F
